name: Midship
title: midship.ai
shortDescription: Midship streamlines the audit process using AI to automatically sort, categorize, and test audit samples. Designed for auditors, it transforms documents into structured work papers and links test results to evidence for easy review. An example use case is during busy audit seasons, where Midship significantly reduces manual workload by automating sample testing and documentation.
pros: Links test results to supporting evidence
Integrates with Excel for enhanced functionality
cons: May not handle very unique or complex audit scenarios

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: AuditBoard
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Comprehensive audit suite with cloud storage
